rdf:Description.dc:title: Report of the post-war reconstruction committee, 1945 1945-03
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Post-War Reconstruction Committee.
Hooke, A. J. (Alfred J.)
rdf:Description.dc:description: Includes appendices issued Mar. 1945, Sept. 1945 and Jan. 1946.
"A. J. Hooke, Chairman, Post-War Reconstruction Committee and Sub-Committee on Finance."

1.Report of the Subcommittee on Agriculture -- 2. Report of the Subcommittee on Education -- 3. Report of the Subcommittee on Finance -- 4. Report of the Subcommittee on Industry -- 5. Report of the Subcommittee on Natural Resources -- 6. Report of the Subcommittee on Public Works -- 7. Report of the Subcommittee on Social Welfare -- appendix 1. Tourism in Alberta -- appendix 2, pt. 1. Report of the survey on agricultural plans and intentions -- appendix 2, pt. 2. Report of survey into householders' buying intentions -- appendix 2, pt. 3. Report on survey of retail, service and industrial establishments.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Reconstruction (1939-1951)
